questions.q: How often can I download my credit reports?
questions.a: You can download your credit report as many times as you want with the PREMIUM subscription.

questions.q: What do I do if, after downloading my credit history, I discover loans that are not in my name?
questions.a: GENIUS and PREMIUM subscriptions include the anti-fraud monitoring service, which alerts you immediately if any suspicious changes appear in your history. If they are not yours, you can always contact us for support and guidance.

questions.q: How can I make sure that no one uses my data to access loans in my name?
questions.a: Fraud monitoring alerts you immediately if there is any change in your credit history, protecting you from potential fraud.

questions.q: How can I track my credit history in real time to understand how my payments affect my credit score?
questions.a: With two reports included monthly and anti-fraud monitoring, the GENIUS subscription is perfect for constant, detailed tracking, while the PREMIUM subscription allows you to update your data daily and download as many times as you need.

questions.q: How can I check my credit history consistently without paying extra for each report?
questions.a: With the SMART subscription you can regularly monitor your credit history for just 87 lei a month.
